definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fishing, fishery, only in [[וְנִשָּׂא]] [[בְּסִירוֹת דּוּגׇה]] Am 4:2 (‖[[בְּחִנּוֹת]]) of ´[[י]], metaph. for dragging Isr. captive (cf. for practice referred to, in case of fish, Ez Eze 29:4 & Job 40:26 scornful summons to do it with crocodile, if possible ! v. Herod:ii. 70 on mode of capturing crocodiles).
